sentences.en: Pen was sarcastic and dandified when he had been in the company of great folks.
sentences.cn: 潘每逢跟一些大人物相处以后,便变得尖酸刻薄,满不在乎地挖苦他们.

sentences.en: The Commonwealth cause is identified with state oppression, the dandified royalist side with light and life.
sentences.cn: 英联邦的事业被视为国家压迫，打扮华丽的保皇党支持光明和生活。

words.tran_cn: 上等的，极好的（口语）；服装华丽的

trans.tran_cn: 打扮时髦，使像花花公子(dandify的过去分词)
